The early sharp move toward Seattle (-3 to -4.5) suggests some respected money liked the Seahawks, but that’s already reflected in both the spread and this market probability. At the same time, there are some contrarian hooks (Patriots moneyline popularity; Seattle allowing explosive plays vs the Rams), but they aren’t strong/quantified enough to justify a 15–25% bankroll bet given how high-variance a single Super Bowl is.
